name: Iberostar Grand Salome
overview: The iberostar Grand Salome has an exceptional location in the south of Tenerife, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. It is situated between the Gulf del Sur and rthe Amarillo Golf courses, and is an ideal hotrl for families, couples and groups who are looking for a holiday full of sport, sun and sea.
